name: Li3 users
body:
### li3_users
This is branched off of li3_users module from [Sphere](https://github.com/UnionOfRAD/sphere). I posted this for easy of add to future projects...

```
git submodule add https://github.com/fastmover/li3_users.git libraries/li3_users
```
tagline: Just a great Repo that, up until now, could only be found in Sphere's repo on github.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
